statements: SELECT * FROM mediation_plans WHERE case_id = 123;
SELECT id, mediator_name, start_date FROM mediation_plans WHERE mediation_type = 'Family';
SELECT mediator_name, start_date, end_date FROM mediation_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, mediator_name FROM mediation_plans WHERE mediation_type = 'Conflict' AND end_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM mediation_plans WHERE notes IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, case_id, mediator_name FROM mediation_plans WHERE mediation_type='Facilitative' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM mediation_plans WHERE case_id=123 AND start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT case_id, mediator_name, notes FROM mediation_plans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY case_id, start_date
SELECT mediator_name, start_date, end_date FROM mediation_plans WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, case_id, start_date, end_date FROM mediation_plans WHERE mediation_type IN ('Evaluative', 'Facilitative') ORDER BY case_id ASC, start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CaseData WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM CaseData WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_status FROM CaseData WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediationPlan WHERE mediation_date > '2021-01-01' AND mediation_outcome IS NOT NULL;
SELECT mediation_id, case_id, mediator_name FROM MediationPlan WHERE mediator_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY mediation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CaseData WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM CaseData ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(mediation_date) AS latest_mediation_date FROM MediationPlan;
SELECT case_id, mediator_name, mediation_date FROM MediationPlan WHERE mediation_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM CaseData JOIN MediationPlan ON CaseData.case_id = MediationPlan.case_id;
SELECT * FROM MediationCases;
SELECT case_title, case_description FROM MediationCases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE participant_role = 'Mediator';
SELECT plan_details, case_id FROM MediationPlan WHERE plan_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediationCases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_id, case_title FROM MediationCases WHERE case_description LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_role = 'Mediator' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT pc.participant_name, mc.case_title FROM Participants pc JOIN MediationCases mc ON pc.participant_id = mc.case_id;
SELECT MAX(plan_id) AS max_plan_id, COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM MediationPlan;
SELECT * FROM PersonalDetails;
SELECT first_name, age FROM PersonalDetails WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails ORDER BY date_of_incident DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_type = 'Mediation';
SELECT name, expertise FROM Mediators WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY expertise;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM PersonalDetails WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails WHERE date_of_incident BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY case_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, expertise, experience_years FROM Mediators WHERE expertise LIKE '%Family%' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;

SELECT pd.first_name, pd.last_name, cd.case_type FROM PersonalDetails pd INNER JOIN MediationPlan mp ON pd.id = mp.case_id INNER JOIN CaseDetails cd ON mp.case_id = cd.case_id WHERE mp.status = 'Planned';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM CaseDetails WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Clients WHERE client_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Cases ORDER BY case_start_date DESC;
SELECT case_description, case_status FROM Cases WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_specialty FROM Mediators;
SELECT * FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Clients WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT client_name, case_description FROM Clients JOIN Cases ON Clients.client_id = Cases.client_id;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_specialty FROM Mediators WHERE mediator_specialty = 'Family Law';
SELECT plan_description, plan_date FROM Mediation_Plans JOIN Cases ON Mediation_Plans.case_id = Cases.case_id;
